title: My phone is being hacked by someone I know. How can I mess their phone up? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you have evidence such person is hacking your phone? Can you definitely prove it is them? If so, contact the police and the person will go to prison. Hacking in a device without permission of the owner is a federal crime. (Computer Fraud and Abuse Act of 1986) I recommend checking out the below link and reading into it. https://www.hg.org/legal-articles/someone-hacked-my-phone-or-computer-what-can-i-do-35155
Assuming it's a friend, you don't want them to go to jail, so if you know for sure that they're hacking your phone, you can take the phone case or screen or battery? Depends how far you want to go.
